column1: Peñaflor (Spanish pronunciation: [peɲaˈfloɾ]) is a city and commune of the Talagante Province in central Chile's Santiago Metropolitan Region.
It can be found in the Chilean Central Valley approximately 37 km (23 mi) southwest of the metropolitan area of Santiago. The commune spans an area of 69.2 km2 (27 sq mi).
